entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
